SLEAutoNameInfo: Enables auto-naming while saving parts, assemblies and drawings files in 3DEXPERIENCE for the first time. It applies to all applications authoring Solid Edge data.
SLEReplaceTitleByNewNameOnAutonameLabel: Replace Title By New Name On Autoname
SLEReplaceTitleByNewNameOnAutonameInfo: On selection of autoname on save dialog, the existing filename will be replaced by the autoname.
SLECADAttributeMappedToEINInfo: When value for this attribute is specified,then the function will be enabled and we will stamp CAD file with this attribute and its value would be the EIN of the Physical Product.
SLEEnablePessimisticLockingInfo: Enabling this feature ensures that data cannot be saved to the platform from the connector unless it is reserved by the current user.
SLECheckinCFGfilesInfo: Enabling this feature ensures that CFG file will also be checkedin along with Assembly to the 3DEXPERIENCE
SLEFileReadOnlyInfo: File will be marked as read-only if it is not reserved by current user. This behavior will be enabled only if pessimistic locking is enabled.
SLECADFilterOutNotInCADDataLabel: Filter out 3DEXPERIENCE engineering items with no geometry and no child nodes
SLECADFilterOutNotInCADDataInfo: Filter out 3DEXPERIENCE engineering items with no geometry and no child nodes.
SLEDelimiterInfo:
This delimiter will be used as follows:
1. To merge values of multi-valued attributes in 3DEXPERIENCE when synchronizing on CAD file.
2. To split CAD attribute value if it is mapped to multi-valued attribute in 3DEXPERIENCE.
InvalidDelimiter: More than one character is not allowed as a delimiter
SLEConnectNativeDrawingAsLabel: Connection between Physical Products and Drawings
SLEConnectNativeDrawingAsInfo:
This will be used to make Connection between Physical Products and Drawings as one of the three types. 
This will be one time setting. 
Do not change once done.
SLEDependencyLinkOnlyLabel: Connect as dependency link - Drawing is not a child of the Physical Product
SLEInstantiatedDrawingLabel: Connect Drawing as child of the Physical Product
SLEAggregatedDrawingLabel: Drawing is aggregated below the Physical Product
